title: Pu`ukoholÄ Heiau National Historic Site: Restaurants
body: Local Restaurants          Pu'ukohola Heiau does not offer dining or refreshment facilities at this time. There are several convenient restaurants, a deli and roadside eateries located at Kawaihae (only 1 mile north) Waimea (15 miles east) and the Waikoloa Resorts (15 miles south) have delicious, upscale and fast food restaurants.
